param.name: USER
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[User]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[User name - Can be overriden on a per-user basis (see users 'Personal Data' tab)]

param.name: PASS
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Password]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[User password - Can be overriden on a per-user basis.]

param.name: USE_SESSION_CREDENTIALS
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Session credentials]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Use the current Pydio user credentials for connecting, or prompt the user. Warning, make sure to enable the 'Set Session Credentials' option in the main Authentication options.]

param.name: SESSION_CREDENTIALS_FREE_LOGIN
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Allow alternative login]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[If credentials are not set in the session, user is prompted to enter a password. Check this if the user can also enter an alternative login.]

param.name: USER_DESCRIPTION
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Description]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[A user-defined description of the content of this workspace]

param.name: DEFAULT_RIGHTS
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Default Rights]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[This right pattern (empty, r, or rw) will be applied at user creation for this repository.]

param.name: AJXP_SLUG
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Alias]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Alias for replacing the generated unique id of the repository]

param.name: AJXP_GROUP_PATH_PARAMETER
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Group Path]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Set this repository group owner : only users of this group will see it]

param.name: AJXP_WEBDAV_DISABLED
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Disable WebDAV]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Explicitly disable WebDAV access for this repository.]

param.name: TPL_USER_CAN_CREATE
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Allow to user]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Allow non-admin users to create a repository from this template.]

param.name: TPL_GRP_ADMINS_CAN_CREATE
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Allow to group admins]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Allow group administrators to create a repository from this template.]

param.name: TPL_DEFAULT_LABEL
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Default Label]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Prefilled label for the new repository, you can use the AJXP_USER keyworkd in it.]

param.name: TPL_ICON_SMALL
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Small Icon]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[16X16 Icon for representing the template]

param.name: TPL_ICON_BIG
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Big Icon]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Big Icon for representing the template]

param.name: RECYCLE_BIN
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Recycle Bin Folder]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Leave empty if you do not want to use a recycle bin.]

param.name: CHARSET
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Character Encoding]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[If your server does not set correctly its charset, it can be good to specify it here manually.]

param.name: PAGINATION_THRESHOLD
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Pagination Threshold]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[When a folder will contain more items than this number, display will switch to pagination mode, for better performances.]

param.name: PAGINATION_NUMBER
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[#Items per page]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Once in pagination mode, number of items to display per page.]

param.name: REMOTE_SORTING
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Remote Sorting]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Force remote sorting when in paginated mode. Warning, this can impact the performances.]

param.name: REMOTE_SORTING_DEFAULT_COLUMN
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Remote Sorting Default Field]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Default field to sort on]

param.name: REMOTE_SORTING_DEFAULT_DIRECTION
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Remote Sorting Default Direction]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Default sorting direction]

param.name: UX_DISPLAY_DEFAULT_MODE
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Default Display Mode]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Default display]

param.name: UX_SORTING_DEFAULT_COLUMN
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Default Sorting Field]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Default Sorting]
param.choices: natural|Natural Sorting (folders first then files),filename|File Name (mixing files and folders),bytesize|File Size,ajxp_modiftime|Last Modified

param.name: UX_SORTING_DEFAULT_DIRECTION
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Default Sorting Direction]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Default Sorting Direction]

global_param.name: HIDE_RECYCLE
global_param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Hide recycle bin]
global_param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Whether to show the recycle bin folder. Unlike in the following options, the folder will be hidden but still writeable.]

global_param.name: HIDE_EXTENSIONS
global_param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Hide extensions]
global_param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Comma-separated list of extensions to hide. Extensions, files and folders that are hidden are also access forbidden.]

global_param.name: HIDE_FOLDERS
global_param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Hide folders]
global_param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Comma-separated list of specific folders to hide]

global_param.name: HIDE_FILENAMES
global_param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Hide files]
global_param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Comma-separated list of specific files to hide]

global_param.name: DEFAULT_METASOURCES
global_param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Default Metasources]
global_param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Comma separated list of metastore and meta plugins, that will be automatically applied to all repositories created with this driver]

param.name: AUTOCREATE_AJXPUSER
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Auto Create User]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[When set to true, the user object is created automatically if the authentication succeed. Used by remote authentication systems.]

param.name: LOGIN_REDIRECT
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Login Redirect]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[If set to a given URL, the login action will not trigger the display of login screen but redirect to this URL.]

param.name: AJXP_ADMIN_LOGIN
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Admin Login]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[For exotic auth drivers, an user ID that must be considered as admin by default.]

param.name: AUTO_APPLY_ROLE
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Auto apply role]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[For multiple authentication, apply this role to users authenticated via this driver]

param.name: USE_OAUTH_STREAM
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[OAuth Stream enabled]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[OAuth Stream enabled]

param.name: CLIENT_ID
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Client ID]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Client ID]

param.name: CLIENT_SECRET
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Client SECRET]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Client SECRET]

param.name: AUTH_URL
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Auth URL]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[API endpoint - Used to launch the window allowing the user to authenticate and accept the terms of the app]

param.name: TOKEN_URL
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Token URL]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[API endpoint - Used to refresh or validate the token retrieved in the authentication part]

param.name: REDIRECT_URL
param.label: MIXIN_MESSAGE[Redirect URL]
param.description: MIXIN_MESSAGE[API setting - Redirect URL for the OAuth Application]
